org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.hadoop.taskexecutor.external.communication

Interface HadoopCommunicationClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HadoopAbstractCommunicationClient, HadoopTcpNioCommunicationClient

    public interface HadoopCommunicationClient

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean close() 
      boolean closed() 
      void forceClose()
      Forces client close.
      long getIdleTime()
      Gets idle time of this client.
      void release()
      Releases this client by decreasing reservations.
      boolean reserve() 
      boolean reserved() 
      void sendMessage(HadoopProcessDescriptor desc, HadoopMessage msg) 

    • Method Detail

      • close

        boolean close()
        Returns:
        True if client has been closed by this call, false if failed to close client (due to concurrent reservation or concurrent close).

      • forceClose

        void forceClose()
        Forces client close.

      • closed

        boolean closed()
        Returns:
        True if client is closed;

      • reserve

        boolean reserve()
        Returns:
        True if client was reserved, false otherwise.

      • release

        void release()
        Releases this client by decreasing reservations.

      • reserved

        boolean reserved()
        Returns:
        True if client was reserved.

      • getIdleTime

        long getIdleTime()
        Gets idle time of this client.
        Returns:
        Idle time of this client.

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(HadoopProcessDescriptor desc,
                 HadoopMessage msg)
          throws IgniteCheckedException
        Parameters:
        desc - Process descriptor.
        msg - Message to send.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.
